name: jdatestamp
short_description:
jdatestamp is a command line utility to losslessly imprint 
date/time of a picture taken in a digital camera into its JPEG 
image. Uses the EXIF header information to get the date/time,
jpegtran with droppatch for lossless crop drop of date/time area
